scenes.action_text: Brazil Screenplay (Draft)   1   EXT.   CITYSCAPE                         SUNSET           1  A beautiful golden sun is setting. The sky is on fire. The CAMERA starts to move downwards. A large neon sign rises into shot. It rests on top of a skyscraper and fills the frame. The building is neither past nor future in design but a bit of both.      Slowly we pan downw
